00062 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(App, wxApp)
00063         EVT_GNR_TREE_CONTROL(0, App::OnGNRTreeEvent)                 // tree events
00064         EVT_GNR_NOTIFY(0, App::OnGNREvent)                           //global event for redraw...
00065         EVT_GL_NOTIFY(0, App::OnGLEvent)                             //event for mouse and move in GL...
00066         EVT_GNR_LINE_DRAW(0, App::OnLineDrawEvent)                   //event to draw a line in gl
00067         EVT_GNR_CREATE_PRIMITIVE(0, App::OnCreatePrimitiveEvent)     //event to draw a line in gl
00068 END_EVENT_TABLE()

00075 bool App::OnInit()
00076 {
00077         bool wxsOK = true;
00078 
00079         wxInitAllImageHandlers();
00080 
00081         if (wxsOK)
00082         {
00083                 //build gui
00084                 initFrames();
00085 
00086 #if defined(__ATHOS_DEBUG__)
00087                 // Create DebugFrame
00088                 m_DebugFrame = new DebugFrame(m_MainFrame);
00089                 m_DebugFrame->Show(true);
00090                 m_Log = new wxLogTextCtrl(m_DebugFrame->TextCtrl);
00091                 m_Log->SetActiveTarget(m_Log);
00092                 //build models
00093                 m_Tests         = new Tests();
00094 #endif
00095 
00096                 m_Scene         = Scene::getInstance();
00097                 m_MouseCtrl     = new MouseController(m_Scene);
00098 
00099                 m_TreeLibCtrl   = new TreeLibraryController(m_TreeCtrlLib);
00100                 m_TreeSceneCtrl = new TreeSceneController(m_TreeCtrlScene);
00101                 m_UndoRedo      = UndoRedo::getInstance();
00102 
00103                 m_Scene->setCanvas2D(m_Canvas2D);
00104                 m_Scene->setCanvas3D(m_Canvas3D);
00105 
00106                 //initialize whole menus
00107                 initialSetup();
00108         }
00109 
00110         return wxsOK;
00111 }

00116 void App::initFrames()
00117 {
00118         //create main frame
00119         m_MainFrame = new MainFrame(0);
00120 
00121         //main splitter window
00122         m_VerticalSplitter = new wxSplitterWindow(m_MainFrame, -1, wxPoint(0,0), wxDefaultSize, wxSP_3D|wxSP_NO_XP_THEME|wxSP_LIVE_UPDATE);
00123         m_VerticalSplitter->SetMinimumPaneSize(200);
00124 
00125         //create splitter for left panel with tree and models
00126         m_HorizontalSplitter_left = new wxSplitterWindow(m_VerticalSplitter, -1, wxPoint(0,0), wxDefaultSize, wxSP_3D|wxSP_NO_XP_THEME|wxSP_LIVE_UPDATE);
00127         m_HorizontalSplitter_left->SetMinimumPaneSize(100);
00128 
00129         //create splitter for right panel with two canvas
00130         m_HorizontalSplitter_right = new wxSplitterWindow(m_VerticalSplitter, -1, wxPoint(0,0), wxDefaultSize, wxSP_3D|wxSP_NO_XP_THEME|wxSP_LIVE_UPDATE);
00131         m_HorizontalSplitter_right->SetMinimumPaneSize(100);
00132 
00133         //create tree and models panel
00134         m_TreePanelLibrary = new TreePanelLibrary(m_HorizontalSplitter_left, wxID_ANY);
00135         m_TreePanelMyScene = new TreePanelMyScene(m_HorizontalSplitter_left, wxID_ANY);
00136 
00137         //create TreeCntr
00138         m_TreeCtrlLib = new TreeLibraryCtrl(m_TreePanelLibrary, wxID_ANY);
00139         m_TreeCtrlScene = new TreeSceneCtrl(m_TreePanelMyScene, wxNewId(), wxPoint(0, 0), m_TreePanelMyScene->GetSize(), wxTR_DEFAULT_STYLE, wxDefaultValidator, wxT("TreePanelMyScene"));
00140 
00141         //create two canvas panels
00142         m_Canvas2D = new GLCanvas2D(m_HorizontalSplitter_right, -1);
00143         commonCtxt = m_Canvas2D->GetContext();
00144         m_Canvas3D = new GLCanvas3D(m_HorizontalSplitter_right, commonCtxt, -1);
00145 
00146         //initialize left and right splitter
00147         m_VerticalSplitter->Initialize(m_HorizontalSplitter_left);
00148         m_VerticalSplitter->Initialize(m_HorizontalSplitter_right);
00149 
00150         //initialize both treepanels
00151         m_HorizontalSplitter_left->Initialize(m_TreePanelLibrary);
00152         m_HorizontalSplitter_left->Initialize(m_TreePanelMyScene);
00153 
00154         //initialize both canvases
00155         m_HorizontalSplitter_right->Initialize(m_Canvas2D);
00156         m_HorizontalSplitter_right->Initialize(m_Canvas3D);
00157 
00158         //split right splitter in upper (2D) and lower (3D) canvas
00159         m_HorizontalSplitter_right->SplitHorizontally(m_Canvas2D, m_Canvas3D);
00160 
00161         //split left splitter in upper (library) and lower (myscene) treeview
00162         m_HorizontalSplitter_left->SplitHorizontally(m_TreePanelLibrary, m_TreePanelMyScene);
00163 
00164         //split vertical (main) splitter in left and right splitter
00165         m_VerticalSplitter->SplitVertically(m_HorizontalSplitter_left, m_HorizontalSplitter_right);
00166 
00167         m_VerticalSplitter->SetSashPosition(200,true);
00168         m_HorizontalSplitter_left->SetSashPosition(300,true);
00169         m_HorizontalSplitter_right->SetSashPosition(200,true);
00170 
00171         //show mainframe now, its ready
00172         m_MainFrame->Show(true);
00173 }

00201 void App::OnGNREvent(NotifyEvent& event)
00202 {
00203         switch (event.getGNREventType())
00204         {
00205         case GLREFRESH:
00206                 updateSplitters();
00207                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00208                 break;
00209         case REFRESHSCENETREE:
00210                 m_TreeSceneCtrl->createSceneTree();
00211                 break;
00212         case NEWROOM:
00213                 m_Scene->newRoom();
00214                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00215                 break;
00216         case OPXOPEN:
00217                 OPXOpen(event.GetString());
00218                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00219                 break;
00220         case OPXSAVE:
00221                 OPXSave(event.GetString());
00222                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00223                 break;
00224         case OAXIMPORT:
00225                 OAXImport(event.GetString());
00226                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00227                 break;
00228         case OAXEXPORT:
00229                 OAXExport(event.GetString());
00230                 //m_Scene->glRefresh();
00231                 break;
00232         case OBJOAXCONVERSION:
00233                 ObjOaxConversion(event.getAssemblyDataPointer());
00234                 break;
00235         case OBJIMPORT:
00236                 OBJImport(event.GetString());
00237                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00238                 break;
00239         case OBJEXPORT:
00240                 OBJExport(event.GetString());
00241                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00242                 break;
00243         case TOOLBARCHANGE:
00244                 m_MouseCtrl->setTranslation(event);
00245                 break;
00246         case RESETCAMERA:
00247                 m_Scene->resetCamera();
00248                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00249                 break;
00250         case SNAPTOGRID:
00251                 m_MouseCtrl->setSnapfunction(event);
00252                 break;
00253         case PANELSIZE:
00254                 updateSize();
00255                 break;
00256         case SCREENSHOT:
00257                 createScreenshot(event.GetString());
00258                 break;
00259         case UNDO:
00260                 m_UndoRedo->undo();
00261                 m_Scene->glRefresh();
00262                 break;
00263         case REDO:
00264                 m_UndoRedo->redo();
00265                 m_Scene->glRefresh();

00267         case RESETOBJECT:

00279         case DELETESELECTED:

00282                 break;
00283         case CLONESELECTED:
00284                 m_Scene->cloneSelectedAssemblies();

00287         case COPYSELECTED:

00300                 m_Scene->hideSelectedAssemblies();

00303         case SETUNDOENABLED:
00304                 m_MainFrame->setUndoEnabled(event.GetInt());

00320                 m_Scene->deleteTrashAssemblies();
00321                 break;

00323         case DEBUG1:
00324                 m_Tests->sizeXsizeLoopsLoadClean(m_Scene,10,10);
00325                 break;
00326         case DEBUG2:
00327                 m_Tests->loadTieFighter(m_Scene,10);

00339 void App::OnGNRTreeEvent(TreeControlEvent& event)
00340 {
00341         switch (event.getEventType())
00342         {
00343         case LIBRARYDELETE:
00344                 if (event.getCat())
00345                 {
00346                         m_TreeLibCtrl->deleteCategory(event.GetString());
00347                 }
00348                 else
00349                 {
00350                         m_TreeLibCtrl->deleteEntry(event.GetString());
00351                 }
00352                 break;
00353         case LIBRARYPASTE:
00354                 m_TreeLibCtrl->pasteEntry(event.GetString());
00355                 break;
00356         case LIBRARYEXPORT:
00357                 OAXExport(event.GetString());
00358                 break;
00359         case LIBRARYNEWCAT:
00360                 m_TreeLibCtrl->addCategory(event.GetString(), event.getNewName());
00361                 break;
00362         case LIBRARYMENURENAME:
00363                 if (event.getCat())
00364                 {
00365                         m_TreeLibCtrl->renameCategory(event.GetString(), event.getNewName());
00366                 }
00367                 else
00368                 {
00369                         m_TreeLibCtrl->renameEntry(event.GetString(), event.getNewName());
00370                 }
00371                 break;
00372         case SCENEVISIBLE:
00373                 m_Scene->showAssembly(event.getAssembly());
00374                 break;
00375         case SCENEHIDE:
00376                 m_Scene->hideAssembly(event.getAssembly());
00377                 break;
00378         case SCENESELECT:
00379                 m_Scene->selectAssembly(event.getAssembly());
00380                 break;
00381         case SCENEDESELECT:
00382                 m_Scene->selectAssembly(event.getAssembly());
00383                 break;
00384         case SCENEDELETE:
00385                 m_Scene->deleteAssembly(event.getAssembly());
00386                 break;
00387         case SCENEUNDELETE:
00388                 m_Scene->restoreAssembly(event.getAssembly());
00389                 break;
00390         }
00391 }
00392 
00396 void App::OnGLEvent(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00397 {
00398         //on double click select assembly
00399         if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonDClick(LEFT_BUTTON))
00400         {
00401                 m_MouseCtrl->setSelected(event);
00402         }
00403 
00404         //if any mouse down set mediator and on right down, select too
00405         else if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonDown(-1))
00406         {
00407                 m_MouseCtrl->setMediator(event);
00408 
00409                 if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonDown(RIGHT_BUTTON))
00410                 {
00411                         //m_MouseCtrl->setMediator(event);
00412                         m_MouseCtrl->setSelected(event);
00413                 }
00414         }
00415 
00416         //if left or middle mouse button is down, translate event to mediator
00417         else if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonIsDown(-1))
00418         {
00419                 m_MouseCtrl->activateMediator(event);
00420         }
00421 
00422         //if left or middle mouse button goes up, create command-object for undo
00423         else if (event.getMouseEvent().ButtonUp(LEFT_BUTTON) || event.getMouseEvent().ButtonUp(MIDDLE_BUTTON))
00424         {
00425                 m_MouseCtrl->deactivateMediator();
00426         }
00427 
00428         //if event is scroll-event, translate event to mediator
00429         else if (event.getMouseEvent().GetWheelRotation())
00430         {
00431                 m_MouseCtrl->setMediator(event);
00432                 m_MouseCtrl->activateMediator(event);
00433         }
00434 }

00447 void App::OnCreatePrimitiveEvent(CreatePrimitiveEvent& event)
00448 {
00449         if (event.getPrimitiveType() == CUBOID)
00450         {
00451                 Vertex origin(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00452                 Assembly* atomic;
00453 
00454                 //get creator instance
00455                 PrimitiveCreator creator;
00456 
00457                 //create new parent assembly (group of primitives)
00458                 Assembly* primitive = new Assembly(wxT("Wandteil"));
00459 
00460                 //put information of whole group in parent
00461                 primitive->setType(IS_PRIMITIVE);
00462                 primitive->setCenterVertex(event.getPosition());
00463                 primitive->setRotateVertex(event.getAngles());
00464                 primitive->setWidth(event.getDimensions().getX());
00465                 primitive->setHeight(event.getDimensions().getY());
00466                 primitive->setDepth(event.getDimensions().getZ());
00467 
00468                 //create smallest part of primitive
00469                 creator.createCuboid(origin, origin, event.getDimensions());
00470 
00471                 //set color to default
00472                 creator.setMaterial(primitive, DEFAULT_IMPORT_COLOR);
00473 
00474                 //get the primitive
00475                 atomic = creator.getPrimitive();
00476 
00477                 //insert 'small' cuboid in parent
00478                 primitive->addPart(atomic);
00479 
00480                 //put whole in the world
00481                 m_Scene->insertAssembly(primitive);
00482         }
00483 
00484         m_Scene->glRefresh();
00485 }

00492 {

00514 void App::OAXImport(wxString filename)
00515 {
00516         // string to store category
00517         wxString cat;
00518 
00519         // string to store name
00520         wxString name;
00521 
00522         // new filename
00523         wxFileName file;
00524 
00525         // asign filename
00526         file.Assign(filename);
00527 
00528         // create dialog and ask for name
00529         wxTextEntryDialog ted(NULL, wxT("Kategorie, in die importiert werden soll:"));
00530 
00531         // set standard value
00532         ted.SetValue(wxT("Sonstiges"));
00533 
00534         if (ted.ShowModal() == wxID_CANCEL || ted.GetValue().IsEmpty())
00535         {
00536                 // if pressed cancel or void text, take standard category
00537                 cat = wxT("Sonstiges");
00538         }
00539         else
00540         {
00541                 cat = ted.GetValue();
00542         }
00543 
00544         // create wxFFileInputStream
00545         wxFFileInputStream inFile(filename);
00546 
00547         // create wxMemoryoutputStream
00548         wxMemoryOutputStream outMem;
00549 
00550         // copy data
00551         inFile.Read(outMem);
00552 
00553         // dreate wxMemoryInputStream
00554         wxMemoryInputStream inMem(outMem);
00555 
00556         // wxInputStream pointer
00557         wxInputStream* input = &inMem;
00558 
00559         // set name
00560         name = file.GetName();
00561 
00562         // add into lib
00563         m_TreeLibCtrl->addEntry(name, *input, cat);
00564 }
00565 
00570 void App::OAXExport(wxString reference)
00571 {
00572         // filename
00573         const wxString& filename = wxFileSelector(wxT("Object als OAX exportieren..."), wxT(""), wxT(""), wxT(""), wxT("OaxDatei (*.oax)|*.oax"), wxFD_SAVE);
00574 
00575         if (filename.IsEmpty())
00576         {
00577                 // user canceled, do nothing
00578                 return;
00579         }
00580 
00581         // wxFFileOutputStream
00582         wxFFileOutputStream outFile(filename);
00583 
00584         // wxMemoryOutputStream to store oax data
00585         wxMemoryOutputStream* memOut;
00586 
00587         // get data
00588         memOut = m_TreeLibCtrl->exportEntry(reference);
00589 
00590         // wxMemoryInputStream
00591         wxMemoryInputStream inMem(*memOut);
00592 
00593         // copy data
00594         inMem.Read(outFile);
00595 
00596         // delete memOut
00597         delete memOut;
00598 }

00643 void App::ObjOaxConversion(AssemblyData* data)
00644 {
00645         // create new memory output stream
00646         wxMemoryOutputStream memOut;
00647 
00648         // pointer to wxOutputStream
00649         wxOutputStream* outStream = &memOut;
00650 
00651         // create new OaxExport - object
00652         OaxExport out(data, outStream);
00653 
00654         // create new memory input stream
00655         wxMemoryInputStream memIn(memOut);
00656 
00657         // pointer to wxInputStream
00658         wxInputStream* inStream = &memIn;
00659 
00660         // add new entry
00661         m_TreeLibCtrl->addEntry(data->m_name, *inStream, data->m_category);
00662 
00663         // successfull
00664         delete m_ObjOaxConv;
00665 }

00670 void App::initialSetup()
00671 {
00672         //build initial snap to grid settings
00673         NotifyEvent setup_snap(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00674         setup_snap.setGNREventType(SNAPTOGRID);
00675         setup_snap.setSnapToGrid(SNAP_IN_DEFAULT_GRID);
00676         setup_snap.setSnapToAngle(SNAP_IN_DEFAULT_ANGLE);
00677 
00678         //activate snap function on start
00679         m_MouseCtrl->setSnapfunction(setup_snap);
00680 
00681         //send event to refresh Scene-Tree
00682         NotifyEvent setup_tree(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00683         setup_tree.setGNREventType(REFRESHSCENETREE);
00684 
00685         //process event for tree
00686         ProcessEvent(setup_tree);
00687 
00688         //refresh canvas
00689         m_Scene->glRefresh();
00690 }
